title: Brochure, "Knoll International: Bulldog (TM) Chair", late 20th century
medium: Offset lithograph on coated paper in three-ring binder
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: Three part brochure for Knoll International's Bulldog (TM) chair in black and red on white. The cover page of part one is divided horizontally into three parts, with Chairs for companies imprinted in the top third and Chairs for people in the bottom; a photograph in red and black of a partial view of the chair is in the midsection. The design of the cover page of part two, Technical  Specifications, features an all over pattern of various views of  the chair in red outline, and five photographic views of a man in the chair in black and white. On the white cover of part three, Knoll is imprinted in large red letters across the bottom and in small black letters off center at the top. The Bulldog (TM) Chair, price List 1990, is in black in the top right-hand corner.

tombstone.epitaph: Brochure, "Knoll International: Bulldog (TM) Chair", late 20th century.Offset lithograph on coated paper in three-ring binder. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-371-a/n.
